test.instr: (:ins (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X microwave) (type X container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y desk))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y closet) (type Y container))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue))) (:cons_not (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X airconditioner)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl: Go to microwave. Put a book which is yellow on the desk. Put the bottle which is yellow in the closet. Pick up a red cup. Give me the blue book. There must not be a red cup on the plate. Do not go to the airconditioner. Put the black cup on the desk.
